text: Dope is an American nu metal band formed in 1997. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Felons and Revolutionaries (1999) * Life (2001) * Group Therapy (2003) * American Apathy (2005) * No Regrets (2009) * Blood Money Part 1 (2016) * Blood Money Part Zer0 (2023) ==References== Category:Alternative metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1997 Category:Musical quartets Category:Musical groups from New York City
title: Dope (band)
